MOST RECENT RECONNAISSANCE: WESTERN LIMIT SATELLITE PASS 21 FEB 26. 7. REPORT POSITION AND TIME OF ANY ICEBERGS SEA ICE OR STATIONARY RADAR TARGETS THAT MAY LIKELY BE ICE TO THE NEAREST CANADIAN COAST GUARD MARINE COMMUNICATIONS AND TRAFFIC SERVICE STATION OR USING INMARSAT CODE 42. 8. FOR MORE REPORTING INFORMATION OR TO DOWNLOAD SHAPEFILES AND WEEKLY PREDICTIONS, GO TO WWW.NAVCEN.USCG.GOV/INTERNATIONAL-ICE-PATROL. 9. CANCEL THIS MSG 240001Z FEB 26.

SABA BANK HAS BEEN DESIGNATED AS AN IMO ADOPTED AREA TO BE AVOIDED (ATBA) AND PARTICULARLY SENSITIVE SEA AREA (PSSA). 2. TO AVOID THE RISK OF POLLUTION AND DAMAGE TO THE ENVIRONMENT, ENTRY IS PROHIBITED FOR VESSELS OF 300 GROSS TONS AND GREATER, AND ANCHORING IS PROHIBITED FOR ALL VESSELS, IN AREA BOUND BY 17-27.06N 063-56.14W, 17-29.00N 063-55.09W, 17-27.94N 063-43.32W, 17-38.03N 063-27.41W, 17-43.35N 063-32.74W, 17-45.98N 063-29.98W, 17-40.34N 063-21.10W, 17-30.88N 063-10.92W, 17-23.80N 063-11.25W, 17-16.27N 063-15.85W, 17-13.44N 063-26.89W, 17-10.55N 063-41.81W, 17-20.85N 063-49.89W.
